verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Just as I am without one plea, but that Thy blood was shed for me
And that Thou biddest me come to Thee
Oh Lamb of God, I come, I come
Just as I am waiting not to rid my soul of one dark blot
To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot
Oh, Lamb of God, I come, I come
Just as I am though tossed about
With many a conflict many a doubt
Fighting and fears without, without
Oh Lamb of God, I come, I come
Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind
Sight, riches, healing of the mind
Yea, all I need, in Thee I find, Oh Lamb of God, I come, I come
Just as I am, Thou wilt recieve
Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieave
Because Thy promise I believe
Oh Lamb of God, I come, I come
